short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add button to any github repo to clone it into SourceTree

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is a simple chrome plug-in that adds a button into the GitHub "Code" dropdown that opens SourceTree's clone window with all the details populated to clone the GitHub project you're currently on.
